entry.title: Swedish Swimmers
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: House of Sugar
Price: 13.99 - 45.99 (19 variants)

Sweet and fruity! This flavor taste exactly like the Swedish Swimmer we all cherished growing up, minus the cavities. 

VG Ratios:

  • 0, 3 and 6mg - 70% VG
  • 12 and 18mg - 65% VG
  • All salt variants - 50% VG

Note: All our salts are made from benzoic acid free nicotine salts!

entry.title: Fizzy Bottles (previously Yummy Cola)
entry.summary:
Vendor: VanGo Vapes
Type: House of Sugar
Price: 13.99 - 45.99 (19 variants)

One of the most popular beverages transformed into a bite size treat. This flavor is infused with the Kola Nut and when you first inhale, the reminiscing flavor will satisfy your sweet cravings. Minus the cavities! 

VG Ratios:

  • 0, 3 and 6mg - 70% VG
  • 12 and 18mg - 65% VG
  • All salt variants - 50% VG
